text_logic_form: The length of the line $DF$ is $2(x + 5) - 7$ units.
The length of the line $EG$ is $3(x - 2)$ units.
Find the length of the line $EG$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $DF$ is $2(x + 5) - 7$ units.
The length of the line $EG$ is $3(x - 2)$ units.
Find the length of the line $EG$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $G$ and $E$.
Point $B$ also lies on the line connecting $F$ and $D$.
The line connecting $D$ and $G$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $G$ and $F$.
line_instances: There are lines $DE$, $EF$, $FG$, and $GD$, forming the rectangle $DEFG$.
